name: Mark Zuckerberg
description: Mark Zuckerberg is a spineless bot, a Zionist and a narc to the highest bidder. We all saw his flip-flop on content moderation for what it is: taking a knee to curry favor with Trump. He gave $1 million to Trump’s inauguration. Zuck’s platforms have long been a disseminator for Israeli propaganda, and he gave data from WhatsApp to the Israeli Defense Forces (IDF) to target innocent Palestinian civilians for assassination.
